attributes.title: Iâ€™m sad :(
attributes.review: I can not believe this app. As soon as I opened the app, all of my 10 cats began to cry and scream. I was overcome with a sense of agony and pain. I began to cry and shake. Now Iâ€™m very sad and upset, both with this app and with myself. I do not know how to make this up to my cats, how can i be a cat lady with cats who hate her? It is very disappointing and upsetting that such a fowl reaction occurred as I came across this app. I was simply looking for a new game to try, but now my house has caught on fire from the screaming! Would not recommend.
